childMarkdownRemark.html:
His Excellency Dr George Ivanov, President of the Republic of Macedonia visited Qatar Foundation on 29 January 2013. A welcoming committee led by Haya Al Nassr, Director of Qatar Foundation’s Communication Directorate, received the President at Qatar Foundation Visitor Center.

President Ivanov and his delegation listened to a presentation outlining the vision and mission of Qatar Foundation. He was also introduced to the many educational initiatives, community development plans and scientific research programs undertaken by Qatar Foundation.

After the presentation, the president and his delegation were shown an impressive 3D scale model of the current buildings and future construction projects at Qatar Foundation. As the visit came to a close, the president signed the Qatar Foundation visitor’s book and was presented with a manuscript copy of the Holy Qur’an.

President Ivanov, who assumed his position in May 2009, was in Doha on a state visit aimed at enhancing bilateral relations and provides both nations with the opportunity to discuss regional and international issues of mutual concern.
